colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI ^NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO'I YI DAM SGRUB SKOR NAS 'BYUNG BA LTAR BRIS PA DANG, RGYAL BA BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I YI DAM SGRUB SKOR NANG NA YOD KYIS 'DI LA BSNYUNG GNAS SKABS SU SNGA THOG NYIN LAS GZHI GDAN KHRI BYIN BRLABS KHRUS GSOL SOGS BTON NA BZANG DAM SNYAM, ,SBYIR DNGOS NYIN GNYIS KA LA SKABS GANG LA 'JUG KYANG DPAL LDAN ZLA GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA'I BSTOD PA DANG, KUN MKHYEN LNGA PAS SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI SGRUB THABS LA MTSAN LEGS KYI SMON LAM LTA BUR MDZAD PA YOD BZHIN DU 'DON NA BZANG DAM SNYAM PA'I PAR SHING PA BRKO BA'O,, ,,)
